column2: Ingredients : sugar, flour, chocolate, egg, butter. In a saucepan, melt the chocolate and butter. Mix the sugar and eggs, add the melted chocolate-butter and flour; mix well. Butter a square mold and bake at 160°C (320°F) for 15...

Ingredients : sugar, baking powder, flour, vanilla, egg, butter, rum, banana. Mix the eggs with the sugar. Add the melted butter, the flour and the baking powder. Cut the bananas into small pieces (or mash them), and add to the mixture....
